attributes.action: Lobby hard to secure the hosting of the IPL (Indian Premier League) cricket tournament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BCCI have just announced that the IPL cannot be held in India this year due to the elections. We believe it would be hugely profitable, both financially and culturally, if the UK could host the tournament.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
